entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
